explanation: [0-0] On a sports field, two male athletes in white jerseys and one female athlete in a white jersey are standing on the field. The taller male athlete is wearing a white hat. They are looking forward, with a brick-red wall and white buildings behind them, and green grass under their feet. There is a red and white caption on the screen that reads "HE RAN RIGHT TO HIS MOM," along with a red heart.

[0-8] Then, the athlete in the white jersey throws the ball in his hand forward. The ball spins and flies in the air before falling. A player in a white jersey and black shorts with a red hat and a player in a red jersey with a red hat jump up together. The player in white and black catches the ball and holds it in his hands. The player in the red jersey falls backward onto the grass, and the player in white and black also falls and rolls forward, holding the ball tightly in his hands. The surrounding players are all running.
